# DATACLEANING FOR DGZ

## Load the libraries
```{r}
library(data.table)
library(tidyverse)
library(naniar)
library(stringr)
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(magrittr)


# lib = where to save the library  (zonder = default)

package_list <- c("data.table", "tidyverse", "naniar", "stringr", "readr",  "dplyr", "magrittr"
                  )

for (pkg in package_list) {
  if (pkg %in% rownames(.packages()) == FALSE)
  {library(pkg, character.only = TRUE)}

}

```
